short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help users make their art research faster and more easily from the same browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Art Search aims to ease artists' research process by providing them a single extension on which they can get access to different sites search engine.
The user only has to make it's research on Art Search extension and a new tab will then open with the desired site research page.
Each handled site has it's own options on the extension.
